00022 using System;

00025 namespace MathNet.Numerics
00026 {
00032     public struct Quaternion :
00033         IComparable,
00034         ICloneable
00035     {
00036 
00037         // TODO: testing suite for Quaternion
00038 
00039         readonly double qw; // real part
00040         readonly double qx, qy, qz; // imaginary part
00041         readonly double qabs, qnorm; // norm
00042         readonly double qarg; // polar notation
00043 
00047         public
00048         Quaternion(
00049             double real,
00050             double imagX,
00051             double imagY,
00052             double imagZ
00053             )
00054         {
00055             qx = imagX;
00056             qy = imagY;
00057             qz = imagZ;
00058             qw = real;
00059             qnorm = ToNorm(real, imagX, imagY, imagZ);
00060             qabs = Math.Sqrt(qnorm);
00061             qarg = Math.Acos(real / qabs);
00062         }
00063 
00067         internal
00068         Quaternion(
00069             double real,
00070             double imagX,
00071             double imagY,
00072             double imagZ,
00073             double abs,
00074             double norm,
00075             double arg
00076             )
00077         {
00078             qx = imagX;
00079             qy = imagY;
00080             qz = imagZ;
00081             qw = real;
00082             qnorm = norm;
00083             qabs = abs;
00084             qarg = arg;
00085         }
00086 
00087         static
00088         double
00089         ToNorm(
00090             double real,
00091             double imagX,
00092             double imagY,
00093             double imagZ
00094             )
00095         {
00096             return imagX * imagX
00097                 + imagY * imagY
00098                 + imagZ * imagZ
00099                 + real * real;
00100         }
00101         
00102         static
00103         Quaternion
00104         ToUnitQuaternion(
00105             double real,
00106             double imagX,
00107             double imagY, 
00108             double imagZ
00109             )
00110         {
00111             double abs = Math.Sqrt(ToNorm(real, imagX, imagY, imagZ));
00112             return new Quaternion(
00113                 real / abs,
00114                 imagX / abs,
00115                 imagY / abs,
00116                 imagZ / abs,
00117                 1, // abs
00118                 1, // norm
00119                 Math.Acos(real / abs) // arg
00120                 );
00121         }
00122

00126         public double Real
00127         {
00128             get { return qw; }
00129         }
00130 
00132         public double ImagX
00133         {
00134             get { return qx; }
00135         }
00136 
00138         public double ImagY
00139         {
00140             get { return qy; }
00141         }
00142 
00144         public double ImagZ
00145         {
00146             get { return qz; }
00147         }
00148 
00153         public double Abs
00154         {
00155             get { return qabs; }
00156         }
00157 
00159         public double Norm
00160         {
00161             get { return qnorm; }
00162         }
00163 
00165         public double Arg
00166         {
00167             get { return qarg; }
00168         }
00169 
00172         public bool IsUnitQuaternion
00173         {
00174             get { return Number.AlmostEqual(qabs, 1); }
00175         }
00176 
00181         public
00182         Quaternion
00183         Scalar()
00184         {
00185             return new Quaternion(qw, 0, 0, 0);
00186         }
00187 
00191         public
00192         Quaternion
00193         Vector()
00194         {
00195             return new Quaternion(0, qx, qy, qz);
00196         }
00197 
00202         public
00203         Quaternion
00204         UnitVector()
00205         {
00206             return ToUnitQuaternion(0, qx, qy, qz);
00207         }
00208 
00212         public
00213         Quaternion
00214         Sign()
00215         {
00216             return ToUnitQuaternion(qw, qx, qy, qz);
00217         }

00409         #region Arithmetic Methods
00410         
00414         public
00415         Quaternion
00416         Add(
00417             Quaternion q
00418             )
00419         {
00420             return new Quaternion(
00421                 qw + q.qw,
00422                 qx + q.qx,
00423                 qy + q.qy,
00424                 qz + q.qz
00425                 );
00426         }
00427 
00431         public
00432         Quaternion
00433         Add(
00434             double r
00435             )
00436         {
00437             return new Quaternion(
00438                 qw + r,
00439                 qx,
00440                 qy,
00441                 qz
00442                 );
00443         }
00444 
00448         public
00449         Quaternion
00450         Subtract(
00451             Quaternion q
00452             )
00453         {
00454             return new Quaternion(
00455                 qw - q.qw,
00456                 qx - q.qx,
00457                 qy - q.qy,
00458                 qz - q.qz
00459                 );
00460         }
00461 
00465         public
00466         Quaternion
00467         Subtract(
00468             double r
00469             )
00470         {
00471             return new Quaternion(
00472                 qw - r,
00473                 qx,
00474                 qy,
00475                 qz
00476                 );
00477         }
00478 
00482         public
00483         Quaternion
00484         Negate()
00485         {
00486             return new Quaternion(
00487                 -qw,
00488                 -qx,
00489                 -qy,
00490                 -qz,
00491                 qabs, // abs
00492                 qnorm, // norm
00493                 Math.PI - qarg // arg
00494                 );
00495         }
00496 
00497 
00501         public
00502         Quaternion
00503         Multiply(
00504             Quaternion q
00505             )
00506         {
00507             double ci = +qx * q.qw + qy * q.qz - qz * q.qy + qw * q.qx;
00508             double cj = -qx * q.qz + qy * q.qw + qz * q.qx + qw * q.qy;
00509             double ck = +qx * q.qy - qy * q.qx + qz * q.qw + qw * q.qz;
00510             double cr = -qx * q.qx - qy * q.qy - qz * q.qz + qw * q.qw;
00511             return new Quaternion(cr, ci, cj, ck);
00512         }
00513 
00517         public
00518         Quaternion
00519         Multiply(
00520             double d
00521             )
00522         {
00523             return new Quaternion(
00524                 d * qw,
00525                 d * qx,
00526                 d * qy,
00527                 d * qz
00528                 );
00529         }
00530 
00537         public
00538         Quaternion
00539         Divide(
00540             Quaternion q
00541             )
00542         {
00543             return Multiply(q.Inverse());
00544         }
00545 
00554         public
00555         Quaternion
00556         Divide(
00557             double d
00558             )
00559         {
00560             return new Quaternion(
00561                 qw / d,
00562                 qx / d,
00563                 qy / d,
00564                 qz / d
00565                 );
00566         }
00567 
00571         public
00572         Quaternion
00573         Inverse()
00574         {
00575             if(Number.AlmostEqual(qabs, 1))
00576             {
00577                 return new Quaternion(
00578                     qw,
00579                     -qx,
00580                     -qy,
00581                     -qz
00582                     );
00583             }
00584             
00585             return new Quaternion(
00586                 qw / qnorm,
00587                 -qx / qnorm,
00588                 -qy / qnorm,
00589                 -qz / qnorm
00590                 );
00591         }
00592 
00596         public static
00597         double
00598         Distance(
00599             Quaternion a,
00600             Quaternion b
00601             )
00602         {
00603             return a.Subtract(b).Abs;
00604         }
00605 
00609         public
00610         Quaternion
00611         Conjugate()
00612         {
00613             return new Quaternion(
00614                 qw,
00615                 -qx,
00616                 -qy,
00617                 -qz,
00618                 qabs,
00619                 qnorm,
00620                 qarg
00621                 );
00622         }

00626         #region Exponential
00627 
00631         public
00632         Quaternion
00633         Log(
00634             double lbase
00635             )
00636         {
00637             return Ln().Divide(Math.Log(lbase));
00638         }
00639 
00643         public
00644         Quaternion
00645         Ln()
00646         {
00647             return UnitVector().Multiply(qarg).Add(Math.Log(qabs));
00648         }
00649 
00653         public
00654         Quaternion
00655         Lg()
00656         {
00657             return Ln().Divide(Math.Log(10));
00658         }
00659 
00664         public
00665         Quaternion
00666         Exp()
00667         {
00668             double vabs = Math.Sqrt(ToNorm(0, qx, qy, qz));
00669             return UnitVector().Multiply(Math.Sin(vabs)).Add(Math.Cos(vabs)).Multiply(Math.Exp(qw));
00670         }
00671 
00675         public
00676         Quaternion
00677         Pow(
00678             double power
00679             )
00680         {
00681             double arg = power * qarg;
00682             return UnitVector().Multiply(Math.Sin(arg)).Add(Math.Cos(arg)).Multiply(Math.Pow(qw, power));
00683         }
00684 
00688         public
00689         Quaternion
00690         Pow(
00691             Quaternion power
00692             )
00693         {
00694             return power.Multiply(Ln()).Exp();
00695         }
00696 
00700         public
00701         Quaternion
00702         Sqr()
00703         {
00704             double arg = qarg * 2;
00705             return UnitVector().Multiply(Math.Sin(arg)).Add(Math.Cos(arg)).Multiply(qw * qw);
00706         }
00707 
00711         public
00712         Quaternion
00713         Sqrt()
00714         {
00715             double arg = qarg * 0.5;
00716             return UnitVector().Multiply(Math.Sin(arg)).Add(Math.Cos(arg)).Multiply(Math.Sqrt(qw));
00717         }
